level.heading: Additional duties of Mayor.
level.text: The Mayor shall do all things necessary and incidental to the execution of the compact.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-230, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 24-1001.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-122, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 24-1001.
